name: 2018 4th International Conference on Advances in Environment Research
content: 2018 4th International Conference on Advances in Environment Research (ICAER 2018) will be held in Hong Kong during May 28-30, 2018\. == Big point: Prof. Solomon W. Leung, Idaho State University, USA will be our conference chair. Accepted papers will be published into International Journal, which is indexed by EI Compendex,Scopus,Thomson Reuters (WoS), Inspec,et al. == Submission Methods: Email: icaer@cbees.net http://www.easychair.org/conferences/?conf=icaer2018 (.pdf only) == Contact us: Ms. Lydia.
